data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta 2
data.actual_result: You can click on the edit button next to category and delete a category you shouldn't have access.
data.expected_result: The edit button next to the category shouldn't be clickable.
data.short_description: [Visual bug] Categories with no access can be edited and deleted
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a category - Make this category private and only give an admin role permission to access it - Give any other role the manage channels permission - Assign this role to a user - Open the server settings with this user - Go to `Channels` - Click on the edit button next to the category the user shouldn't access
